intro: Cryptobasis, commonly known as the cryptobasis plant, is a genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its slender, aromatic stems and compound leaves that are often finely divided. The flowers are small and clustered in umbels, a common trait among members of its family. Cryptobasis species are typically found in temperate regions, growing in moist, shady environments. Due to their delicate structure and limited distribution, they are of interest to botanists studying plant adaptation and biodiversity.
